title: Black Book L0 Schema
description: Layer 0 canonical schema for Epstein black book contact entries. Source: epsteinsblackbook.com extraction from Wayback Machine archived scans. Coverage: 95 pages of contact entries.

record_id.description: Deterministic UUID generated from row content hash

Page.description: Source page number in original black book

Page-Link.description: Wayback Machine URL to source image (row-level provenance)

Name.description: Display name as written in source (may include multiple people)

Company/Add. Text.description: Company name or additional context text

Surname.description: Parsed surname (may contain multiple names for household entries)

First Name.description: Parsed first name (may contain multiple names for household entries)

Country.description: Country (inconsistent format: US, UK, France, etc.)

Phone (p) – portable/mobile.description: Mobile/portable phone number (may contain multiple numbers separated by |)

Email.description: Email address (may be truncated in source)

data_quality_notes.household_entries: Some Name/Surname fields contain multiple people (e.g., 'Marie Claire & John')

_meta.l1_evolution: Will normalize to identity_mentions via probablepeople parsing per GDR architecture
